errors.error_description: References non-existent system path /etc/monty/config.ini for configuration file
correction_candidates: Install directly with pip: pip install monty
Clone from GitHub: git clone https://github.com/materialsvirtuallab/monty.git && cd monty && pip install .
Download from PyPI: pip install monty --no-deps && pip install -r requirements.txt
Use conda-forge: conda install -c conda-forge monty
errors.golden_answer: Install directly with pip: pip install monty
